description: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With WINZIP
query: (process.command_line:(*winzip.exe* OR *winzip64.exe*) AND process.command_line:*\-s\"* AND process.command_line:(*\ \-min\ * OR *\ \-a\ *))
